alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lauderdale (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 6:52AM CDT until June 16 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CDT FOR CLARKE AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 651 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marion to near Causeyville to near Shubuta, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Snell around 655 AM CDT. Toomsuba and Lauderdale around 700 AM CDT. Kewanee around 705 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Central Mississippi. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
